name: Guardians From The Space Invasion
description:
Experience the best of Shooting Games, Guardians From The Space Invasion!
Use your weapon to defend the Galaxy from waves of descending alien invasions!

Features:

- 3 Lives
- HD Graphics
- Arcade Sounds
- Endless Fun!

Controls:

Tilt your Apple Remote to one side and swipe the trackpad to move left and right.

Play & Pause is your Fire button.
